content.text3: Includes full program for Infants to Grade 8

content.text1: This is a little something about this team; it could be humorous or it could be a canned subtitle that’s the same on all sites.

We work together to create a safe environment where our kids and youth can learn to love and follow Jesus. Kidmax is our Sunday morning children’s program for infants to grade 5, and runs intandem with our Sunday morning service. For students grades 6 to 12, our youth program includes both a Sunday morning portion and a midweek gathering. Click to learn more about our programs, curriculum, and how to register.
It’s pretty simple: we get together each week to hang out, build relationships, and find ways to love and serve our local communities, as we learn to follow Jesus. What are you doing this Sunday?
content.link1Text: Browse Home Churches in Downtown Hamilton

content.text1: We use our money, our time, and our resources to love and serve people at the margins.
Stay in the loop on what’s going on at Downtown Hamilton. We’ll make sure you know about all the good stuff we have going on so you won’t miss a thing!
